_header: Forcy as death is likand love
_description: Robert Henryson, On the Annunciation — six 12-line stanzas

NLS3473.First Lines:
Forcy as deith is likand lufeThrouch quhome al bittir
                    suete…
NLS3473.Last Lines:
…Quhare þi makar of michtis mastIs kyng and þow
                    þer quene Is
NLS3473.Note:
Nineteenth-century transcript Edinburgh,  Edinburgh University Library La.III.450/1 [olim Laing 450], ff.
                    90-92.
